cast.name: 约翰·纳特尔斯 John Nettles
丹妮拉·丹拜-阿什 Daniela Denby-Ashe
凯文·麦克纳利 Kevin McNally
米歇尔·费尔利 Michelle Fairley

director.name: 理查德·霍特豪斯 Richard Holthouse

introduction: Kindly magistrate Gerald Farquharson throws a party in Midsomer Morchant to celebrate local boy John Kinsella winning the world middle-weight title. Guests include local solicitor Giles Braithwaite,his nosy secretary Iris and Grace,tarty wife of Kinsella's abrasive manager Frank Bishop.Gerald, the Bishops - separately - and Sebastian,who is not Gerald's son but the product of his late wife's affair,all want to see Giles urgently but he is murdered and his office ransacked. Sebastian's wife Camilla is pregnant but Sebastian is not the father. In fact he is gay and had had an affair with Giles,for which Iris is black-mailing him. At a reconstruction of a Victorian prize fight in Gerald's gardens Bishop is also murdered,having sacked John's trainer and Grace's lover Teddy,who,with Grace,was planning to take over John's management behind Frank's back. Iris is the third and last victim,of a killer who has gambled rather too much on the outcome of the noble art.
